name: handbrake-js
author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
description: Handbrake for node.js. Brings video encoding.

scripts.lint: jshint lib/*.js scripts/*.js bin/*.js test/*.js; echo
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -t jsdoc2md/README.hbs --sort-by scope,kind lib/*.js > README.md; echo
scripts.watch: baldrick --do 'jsdoc2md -t jsdoc2md/README.hbs lib/*.js > README.md' --when lib/*.js jsdoc2md/*.hbs --change
